::Blazer::

Blazer looks at Techy, a bit alarmed.

"Um..." he says, looking back at the remains of the drones, "I think they're 
fine there, I mean he might need some toys, I mean we can take them out when 
he goes out of there or something, right?"

Blazer might have been a good scientist, but he was a bad fighter, and 
avoided battle as much as possible. Going in there with Berserk might turn 
out to be trouble.
